content: Do you have any jokes about books?

Sure, here's one for you:

Why don't some couples go to the gym?

Because some relationships don't work out!

Wait, that's not about books. Let me try again.

Why did the book go to school?

Because it wanted to learn how to spell better!

Hmm, maybe not the best joke. How about this one?

Why did the book go to the doctor?

It had a bad spine!

I hope that made you smile. If you have any other questions or need more jokes, feel free to ask!
